name: SearchLoyaltyEvents
description:
Retrieve and search for Square loyalty events.

This tool allows you to search for loyalty events within a Square loyalty program, which logs events such as points earned, redeemed, or expired. Use this tool to get details of these events sorted by creation date.

parameters.name: loyalty_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the loyalty account associated with the events to filter.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [loyalty account](entity:LoyaltyAccount) associated with loyalty events.

parameters.name: loyalty_event_types
parameters.description: Array of loyalty event types to filter results. Multiple values are combined using OR logic. Refer to LoyaltyEventType for options.

value_schema.description:
The loyalty event types used to filter the result.
If multiple values are specified, the endpoint uses a 
logical OR to combine them.
See [LoyaltyEventType](#type-loyaltyeventtype) for possible values

parameters.name: start_datetime
parameters.description: A datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating when the time range starts for the search query.

value_schema.description:
A datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating when the time range
starts.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Datetime in RFC 3339 format indicating when the time range ends for the search.

value_schema.description:
A datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating when the time range
ends.

parameters.name: location_ids_for_events_query
parameters.description: List of Location IDs for querying loyalty events. Multiple IDs use OR logic.

value_schema.description:
The [location](entity:Location) IDs for loyalty events to query.
If multiple values are specified, the endpoint uses 
a logical OR to combine them.

parameters.name: order_id_filter
parameters.description: The ID of the order associated with the event to filter results.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [order](entity:Order) associated with the event.

parameters.name: max_results_count
parameters.description: The maximum number of loyalty events to include in the response. Defaults to 30.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of results to include in the response. 
The last page might contain fewer events. 
The default is 30 events.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Provide a pagination cursor to retrieve the next set of results from a previous query.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this to retrieve the next set of results for your original query.
For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).
